scripts.start: bun run build && cd build && npx @google-cloud/functions-framework --target=main
scripts.build: bun run build:backend && bun run build:frontend && cp package.json build/ && bun install --cwd build --production --frozen-lockfile
scripts.deploy: bun run build && gcloud beta run deploy nodejs-http-function --source build --function main --base-image nodejs20 --region europe-west1 --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.build:frontend: bun build src/frontend/index.tsx --sourcemap=linked --outdir build/public && cp src/frontend/index.html build/public
